steps.description: Load a Social Media Post template to streamline your workflow.
Add an A/B test node to compare design variants.
Configure the A/B test to vary styles or prompts.
Use the WYSIWYG preview to add text overlays.
Customize text styling (color, size, weight) in the preview.
Upload a logo to brand your visual.
Invite a collaborator to review your workflow.
Check analytics to track your node usage.
Customize the canvas theme with a gradient background.
Export your canvas as JSON or PNG.
